description:
This is a best seller for a reason. With its 100% merino wool to regulate your body and flatlock seams to keep you comfortable, this top will have you wearing it all year long. A geometric snowflake pattern adds a bit of fair.

  • 100% Merino wool regulates your body temperature and resists odors to keep you focused on pushing hard
  • Gusseted underarms to keep you moving comfortably, all day long
  • Offset shoulder seams won’t get in your way
  • Drop tail hem will keep you covered in any activity
name: icebreaker Merino 200 Oasis LS Crewe First Snow - Men's
